name: Mission Demolition Prototype
description:
How to play:

  • Shoot, shoot and keep shooting until you reach the green zone.
  • Use the last shot's track line to better aim and get those castles down.

Controls:

  • Click and hold on the slingshot to load a bullet and release to shot.
  • ESC to pause.
  • Based on the Apple Picker Prototype from the book "Introduction to Game Design, Prototyping and Development" by Jeremy Gibson.
